==Chinese==

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|女|家|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}}.

===Etymology===
From {{zh-l|家|home, house}}, with the addition of the denominal verbalisation suffix *''-s'' in Old Chinese, meaning “to go to one's new home; to become married”. In the Baxter–Sagart system, an additional pronunciation is posited for the causative sense (“to make someone become married; to [[marry off]]”), formed with the prolific Old Chinese causative prefix *''s-''. Compare {{zh-l|*娶}}.

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|of a woman}} to [[marry]]; to become [[married]] to
#: {{zh-x|嫁 不 出去|unable to get married (to anyone); to be [[left on the shelf]]}}
#: {{zh-x|她 去年 嫁 給 了 大學 同學。|She '''married''' her university classmate last year.}}
# to [[give]] a [[daughter]] in [[marriage]]; to [[marry off]]
#: {{zh-x|嫁 女兒|to give a daughter in marriage; to try to marry off a daughter}}
# {{lb|zh|figurative}} to [[transfer]]; to [[shift]] (harm, charge, etc.); to put the (blame) on another person
#: {{zh-x|嫁禍於人|to '''shift''' the blame on others}}
